transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello. Hello.
Customer: Haan. Vishwakarma construction mein baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Haan. Sir very good evening. Main Shreya baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART ke office se.
Hmm.
Executive: Actually aapki na baat hui thi account manager se Tanya se aur uske baad aapne feedback like not satisfied de diya.
Executive: To iske regarding mujhe discussion karna tha sir kya problem face kar rahe ho ek baar aap mujhe bataiye kyunki uh sab bataiye sir kya problem face kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Company company se kya hai hame lead nahi mil pa rahi madam kahin se kahin tak bhi. Uski baat se santusht hain hum. Baat jo batai na unhone hame isse to hum santusht hain baat wali baat nahi ho rahi hai. Lekin aaj paanch chhe mahine ho gaye apne ko aaj tak apne ko koi aisa kaam nahi mila usse.
Executive: Achha. But by lead vagaira to aap ek dam se use kar rahe ho sir like.
Customer: Bilkul use kar rahe hain beech beech mein maine use karna band kar diya tha fir madam ne bola ki aap use kariye aapko ab sahi sath ab hame kya requirement milti hai labour wali. Labour ka hum karte nahi hai hum to deal lete hain puri.
Executive: Matlab retail ke liye right?
Customer: Deal puri lete hain jaise koi project liya humne project lete hain hum road ka kaam lete hain drain ka kaam lete hain hum building banane ka kaam lete hain hum. Ab hamare paas lead aati hai kay ki labour contractor ki. To labour contractor to hum nahi hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ya koi aati to aisi aati ki humse galti se ho gaya to aisa ek hamara schedule ek catalog hamara aisa banao nahi matlab taki hame wohi wala kaam mile.
Executive: Dekhiye aapka catalog to perfect bana hua hai aap by lead vagaira bhi use kar rahe ho main aapko do teen cheez sir guide karti hun jaise aap waise hi karo aapka conversion zarur hoga. Theek hai aap jo bhi by lead vagaira buy kar rahe ho na sir woh aap koshish karo zero to four hours mein consume kar lene ke liye. Actually hota kya hai agar hum saat aath ghante baad by lead ko buy karke customer se baat kar rahe hote hain to unki pehle hi already deal ho jati hai. Ab aap unse ek din baad ya fir saat ghante baad nau ghante baad agar aap unse baat kar rahe ho to customer agar unki deal sahi okay ho jati hai to aap agar sixth number pe ya seventh number pe call karte ho unko ye reach karte ho to woh ye keh dete hain ki no requirement ya fir maine to nahi kari thi ab woh aapko ye to nahi batayenge ki meri deal ho gayi kisi se kis se hui woh directly bol dete hain no requirement to aapko kya lagta hai ki ye to ye to lead fake hai IndiaMART to lead fake dega. Theek hai to pehli cheez ye hai ki aap jo bhi by lead buy kar rahe ho aap koshish karo ki char ghante ke andar andar apni by lead ko aap buy kar lo. Theek hai aur customer ko follow up karo kyunki jo main aapko percentage dekh rahi hun char ghante ke andar andar sirf aap 30% 18% aise by lead buy kar rahe ho. To conversion ka gap yahin pe aa raha hai sir.
Customer: Chalo main aur ispe bhi thoda zor deta hun.
Executive: Haan aur jo bhi buyer ke calls aa rahe hain woh answer karo aap theek hai jo bhi buyer ke calls aa rahe hain isse kya hoga aapki inquiries bhi badhengi agar aap by lead time pe buy karte ho recently by lead buy karte ho aapki inquiries bhi badhengi aur samne se aapko buyer calls bhi aayenge. Theek hai aur dusri ye cheez ki jis bhi customer se do teen paanch customer se abhi deal ho rahi hogi aap unse ratings reviews mangiye theek hai apni company pe jitna zyada ratings reviews rahega utna zyada humko inquiries aur customer traffic dikhayega ab jaise like for example aise samajhiye sir mintra aur flipkart pe hum shopping karte hain to hum kya karte hain jispe zyada ratings reviews hota hai jo listing listing supplier hota hai hum usi ko connect karte hain right? To yahan bhi aise hi hota hai as a buyer jo product search kar raha hai do companies hai Vishwakarma and construction hai aur dusri company same product line hai aur woh hai chemical plant construction services inpe ratings reviews zyada aur aap pe nahi hai sir to main kya karungi chemical plant construction service ko hi connect karungi aur unko hi unse hi baat karungi. Theek hai to ye cheez ka ek gap aa jata hai to ratings reviews mangiye jin bhi customer se deal hui hui hai. Ye do teen cheez aap follow kijiye main aapko surety deti hun ki aapko na aapka conversion zarur hoga. Ye teen cheez gap aa rahi hai aapki taraf se. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay okay okay karta hun.
Executive: Overall main ek baar aapke account manager ko bol ke ek baar aapke catalog ko jo bhi products vagaira add hai aap se ek baar aur details mang ke ek baar add on kar denge.
Executive: Theek hai sir aur do deal rank hai jaise ek road construction hai theek hai aur ek product hai commercial construction services isme aap deal kar rahe hain kya sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To isko main aapke is keywords ko is product ko main aapke catalog mein add on karwa dun?
Customer: Karwa do.
Executive: Theek hai ek baar main aapko account manager ko bolti hun whatsapp pe connect karke inki details aur photos le lijiye aap de dijiye aapke catalog mein ye add ho jayega kyunki aap in se by lead to buy kar rahe ho but aapke ye keywords jo hai na ye aapke catalog mein add nahi hai ek ye bhi reason hai sir conversion na hone ka theek hai aise aap sirf ek mahina kijiye sir main aapko surety deti hun ki aapka business zarur niklega yahan se theek hai baki aapne jo not satisfied ka ye diya hai na ek baar main is concern ko close kar rahi hun sir ek mail pe ek jayega ki mere se baat ho gayi aapki to ek baar aap yes kar dena satisfied kar dena sir.
Customer: Satisfied kar do.
Executive: Haan. Theek hai sir.
Customer: Ab theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough leads from IndiaMART.

- Leads received are not relevant to business.

- Dissatisfied with the service.



Resolution:

- Executive provided tips to improve lead conversion.

- Suggested buying buyleads within 4 hours.

- Advised to answer all buyer calls.

- Suggested to get ratings and reviews from customers.

- Agreed to add road and commercial construction services.

- Agreed to update the catalog with relevant keywords.

- Executive will close the 'not satisfied' concern.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will focus on buying leads within 4 hours.

- Customer will provide details and photos on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, ratings, reviews, conversion
